name: genie-autotest-print-barcode
description: Auto test for Genie Print Barcode functionality

scripts.test: cd C:/PROJECTS/genie && npx playwright test playwright/tests/printBarcode.spec.ts
scripts.test:ui: cd C:/PROJECTS/genie && npx playwright test playwright/tests/printBarcode.spec.ts --ui
scripts.test:debug: cd C:/PROJECTS/genie && npx playwright test playwright/tests/printBarcode.spec.ts --debug
scripts.test:report: cd C:/PROJECTS/genie && npx playwright test playwright/tests/printBarcode.spec.ts --reporter=html
scripts.test:video: cd C:/PROJECTS/genie && npx playwright test playwright/tests/printBarcode.spec.ts --video=on
scripts.test:headed: cd C:/PROJECTS/genie && npx playwright test playwright/tests/printBarcode.spec.ts --headed
scripts.auth: cd C:/PROJECTS/genie && npx playwright test playwright/tests/authentication.setup.ts

author: Auto Test Team
